name: The House of Da Vinci VR
storyline: You are Da Vinci’s most promising apprentice. Your master, Leonardo, summoned you to Florence and then disappeared immediately afterward. Your quest begins—a search for the truth. However, Leonardo's workshop is brimming with puzzles, inventions, mechanisms, and objects hidden in every corner of the beautifully decorated rooms. You'll need to use all your brainpower to uncover what’s really happening!
summary: Experience the world of The House of Da Vinci like never before in this captivating VR puzzle adventure. Solve complex puzzles, uncover hidden items, and escape rooms, all embodying the Renaissance spirit. Use your intellect to discover what led to your master’s disappearance.
